title: 游戏打不开
author: 夜幕_
txt_content:

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你可以尝试删除 .minecraft\libraries 文件夹。

然后启动器设置，下载源，mcbbs

replies.author: TRLWeiss
replies.txt_content: 下载源连接的问题，换个下载源再安装即可
